content: MetaTodo: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Update help text for brp_launch_bevy_app.txt to document port parameter
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after help text update
Update help text for brp_launch_bevy_example.txt to document port parameter
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after help text update
Update brp_launch_bevy_app.rs to extract port parameter and pass to launch function
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after brp_launch_bevy_app.rs update
Update brp_launch_bevy_example.rs to extract port parameter and pass to launch function
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after brp_launch_bevy_example.rs update
Update process.rs to set BRP_PORT environment variable when port is provided
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after process.rs update
Fix any clippy issues following rules (no dead code markers, no underscore prefixes)
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
CodeReview: Task subagent to review changes focusing on duplication, complexity, and plan validation
When code review returns, STOP and review suggested changes with the user
